longBusinessSummary: Hycroft Mining Holding Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a gold and silver producer in the United States. The company holds interests in the Hycroft mine covering an area of approximately 70,671 acres located in the state of Nevada. As of December 31, 2020, its Hycroft mine had proven and probable mineral reserves of 11.9 million ounces of gold, and 478.5 million ounces of silver. Hycroft Mining Holding Corporation was formerly known as Mudrick Capital Acquisition Corporation. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Denver, Colorado.
